lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic opened his season with a 6-2, 6-2 win over the German qualifier Dustin Brown in the first round of the Qatar Open in Doha.
abstract: Novak Djokovic defeats Dustin Brown in first round of Qatar Open; other tennis results noted.
snippet: Novak Djokovic opened his season with a 6-2, 6-2 win over the German qualifier Dustin Brown in the first round of the Qatar Open in Doha....

headline.main: Djokovic Begins Year With a Victory
headline.print_headline: Djokovic Begins Year With a Victory
